title: Himi 547
lyrics:
M.Kh.
1.
‘Oku tuʻu ‘i he tohi ‘a e fakamatala
Ki he nofo ‘a Sīsū ‘i heni,
‘Ene lau ‘a e tamaiki ko hono tākanga,
Fanga lami ‘a e Tauhi Lelei.
Taumaiā ne u mamata ki hono fofonga,
‘O fanongo ‘a e me’a ne Ne lau;
Pea u ‘ilo ‘a e fisi ki tu’a ‘ene ‘ofa
Ki ha tamasi’i hangē ko au.
2.
‘Oku tu’u ‘i he tohi ne ‘omi tokua
Fānau iiki ni’ihi ki ai,
Ko si’enau feinga ‘a e finemātu’a
Ke Ne fai pē honau tāpuaki.
Hapai pē ‘e Sīsū ‘a e fanga kiʻi me’a -
Taumaiā ko e taha ai au -
‘O tō mei ho’ona fofonga ‘a e lea,
“Mou tuku ‘a e iiki ke haʻu.”
3.
Kae fakafeta’i ‘oku kei faingofua
Ke feohi mo Sīsū ‘i heni,
Neongo ‘a ‘Ene ‘afio ‘olunga
Ko e Pule he fu’u ‘univeesi.
Kau ka lotu ki ai, te Ne hanga mai leva,
‘O ongo’i ‘a e me’a te te lau;
Pea ngaūe ‘a langi ke tali ‘a e lea
‘A ha tamasi’i hangē ko au.
4.
‘E Sīsū, tokoni ki hoku ki’i loto,
Fakama’a mei he kovi kotoa;
Hei’ilo ‘e faifai pea te ta nonofo,
‘O u mamata ki si’o fofonga:
He fonua lelei ne ke ‘alu ke teu,
Nofo’anga kakai kuo ma’a;
‘O u kau mo e hōsitē fānau ne hū,
Kainanga ‘o ho pule’anga. *
